description: Update a project revenue item price estimate.
permissions: User must be an admin or a manager member of the broker that owns the related project revenue item (delegated to project revenue item permissions).
side_effects: Updates a project revenue item price estimate.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument. At least one of --project-estimate-set, --kind, --price-per-unit-explicit, --cost-multiplier, or --created-by must be provided. --kind must be one of: explicit, cost_multiplier. --price-per-unit-explicit must be numeric and is required when kind=explicit; it must be absent when kind=cost_multiplier. --cost-multiplier must be numeric and is required when kind=cost_multiplier; it must be absent when kind=explicit. --created-by is admin only.

flags.name: --price-per-unit-explicit
flags.validation: numeric; required when kind=explicit; must be absent when kind=cost_multiplier

flags.name: --cost-multiplier
flags.validation: numeric; required when kind=cost_multiplier; must be absent when kind=explicit
